channel.title: Need help on creating shops
channel.description: can anyone plz give me a link or something so i can find it i haven't been on moparscape in a while so i kinda forgot some stuff ty[br][size=1]Posted on: October 07, 2007, 04:08:20 PM[/size][hr]sorry for double posting but i really need help can anyone help me?[br][size=1]Posted on: October 07, 2007, 04:10:31 PM[/size][hr]how do i make shops plz some one[flash=200,200][/flash]

item.title: Need help on creating shops
item.dc:creator: @Cryme_Time Cryme Time
item.description:
@Cryme_Time wrote:

[quote=“Vladie, post:2, topic:150020”]open your cfg folder and open up shops. add the shop npc you would like and what they sell. Next go to autospawn.cfg and add that npc to the list with the coords you want the npc to be at. Then leave everything else as 0 and walking type is 1.

Hope I helped.[/quote]
You don’t know shit about making a shop…

If you want real help go to www.rune-server.org and download a shop maker… thats the easiest way to help you out.

Read full topic

Read full topic

item.title: Need help on creating shops
item.dc:creator: @Vladie Vladie
item.description:
@Vladie wrote:

open your cfg folder and open up shops. add the shop npc you would like and what they sell. Next go to autospawn.cfg and add that npc to the list with the coords you want the npc to be at. Then leave everything else as 0 and walking type is 1.

Hope I helped.

Read full topic
